typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudsalescustoemrs
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudsalesaddress
source(output(
		CustomerID as string,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		PhoneNumber as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> streamingCustomers
source(output(
		AddressID as string,
		CustomerID as string,
		AddressLine1 as string,
		AddressLine2 as string,
		City as string,
		State as string,
		ZipCode as string,
		CreatedDate as string,
		UpdatedDate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> cloudstreamingaddress
cloudsalescustoemrs, cloudsalesaddress join(cloudsalescustoemrs@CustomerID == cloudsalesaddress@CustomerID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
DerivedColumn3 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemId,
		GlobalCustomerID,
		CustomerID = cloudsalescustoemrs@CustomerID,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CustomersCreateDate = cloudsalescustoemrs@CreatedDate,
		CustomersUpdatedDate = cloudsalescustoemrs@UpdatedDate,
		AddressesCreatedDate = cloudsalesaddress@CreatedDate,
		{ AddressesUpdatedDate} = cloudsalesaddress@UpdatedDate
	)) ~> SouthridgeCustomers
SouthridgeCustomers derive(CustomersCreateDate = greatest(CustomersCreateDate,AddressesCreatedDate),
		CustomersUpdatedDate = greatest(CustomersUpdatedDate,{ AddressesUpdatedDate})) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		CustomerID = SourceSystemId,
		LastName,
		FirstName,
		AddressLine1,
		AddressLine2,
		City,
		State,
		ZipCode,
		PhoneNumber,
		CustomersCreatedDate = CustomersCreateDate,
		CustomersUpdatedDate
	)) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(CustomersCreatedDate = toDate(CustomersCreatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd'),
		CustomersUpdatedDate = toDate(CustomersUpdatedDate,'yyyy-MM-dd')) ~> DerivedColumn2
Join1 derive(SourceSystemId = 1,
		GlobalCustomerID = add('1-',cloudsalesaddress@CustomerID)) ~> DerivedColumn3
DerivedColumn2 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SouthCustomersAddress
